title: Phase 1.2: Implement engram link Command
description: Create src/cli/link.zig to create connections between Neuronas. Implement connection creation, parse connection type and target ID from arguments. Validate connection type (one of 15 defined types). Read source Neurona file, add connection to source Neurona's YAML frontmatter. Write updated Neurona back to disk. Validate target Neurona exists. Support bidirectional linking option. Write unit tests.

title: Phase 1.1: Implement engram init Command
description: Create src/cli/init.zig to initialize new Cortex. Implement directory structure creation (neuronas/, .activations/, .activations/cache/, assets/). Generate default cortex.json configuration. Create README.md with Cortex overview. Add command-line argument parsing (Cortex name, type). Validate existing Cortex (don't overwrite). Write unit tests for init functionality.

title: Phase 1.3: Fix engram trace Command
description: Fix compilation issues in src/cli/trace.zig. Fix import statements, change Neurona(allocator, filepath) to readNeurona(allocator, filepath). Add missing graph.addNode() method to Graph struct. Test trace command with sample data. Add error handling for missing Neuronas.

title: Phase 2.4: Implement engram update Command
description: Create src/cli/update.zig to update Neurona fields. Parse update specifications (e.g., --set 'status=resolved'). Support multiple field updates in one command. Read existing Neurona file, parse YAML frontmatter. Update specified fields in YAML. Preserve existing frontmatter structure. Validate updated values (e.g., valid states). Write back to disk with updated timestamp. Add dry-run mode for preview. Write unit and integration tests.

title: Phase 2.7: Implement engram release-status Command
description: Create src/cli/release_status.zig for release readiness checks. Query all requirements. Check test coverage for each requirement (count tests with validates connection, check test status passing/failing/not_run). Identify blocking issues (find issues with blocks connection to requirements/artifacts, check issue status open/in_progress). Calculate completion percentage (requirements with passing tests / total requirements). Generate release readiness report with overall readiness score 0-100%, uncovered requirements list, failing tests list, blocking issues list, recommendations. Add JSON output for CI/CD pipelines. Write comprehensive tests.

title: Increase Test Coverage to 90%
description: Run coverage analysis on all modules. Add unit tests for edge cases in core/neurona.zig. Add unit tests for error conditions in storage/filesystem.zig. Add unit tests for all connection types in core/graph.zig. Add unit tests for state transitions. Add property-based tests for graph operations. Add fuzz testing for YAML parsing. Add cross-platform filesystem tests. Verify 90%+ coverage across all modules.

title: Phase 1.5: Complete Utility Functions
description: Complete src/utils/timestamp.zig implementation. Implement ISO 8601 timestamp generation using std.time. Add getCurrentTimestamp(allocator: Allocator) ![]u8 function. Write unit tests for timestamp functions. Ensure timezone handling is correct.

title: Phase 2.6: Implement engram link-artifact Command
description: Create src/cli/link_artifact.zig to link source files to requirements. Accept file path and requirement ID as arguments. Verify file exists on filesystem. Create artifact Neurona automatically: generate ID from file path, set type to artifact, set context.runtime from file extension, set context.file_path to absolute path, detect language from extension. Link artifact to requirement using implements connection. Validate requirement exists. Write artifact Neurona to disk. Add tests for various file types.

title: Phase 2.1: Complete engram trace Command
description: Enhance src/cli/trace.zig after fixing compilation. Implement tree visualization with proper indentation. Add connection type filtering. Add depth limiting with --max-depth flag. Implement bidirectional trace with --direction flag. Add color-coded output (different types). Write comprehensive tests.

title: Phase 1.4: Implement CLI Command Router
description: Rewrite src/main.zig to implement CLI command structure with subcommands. Design argument parsing using std.process.args. Create command registry/dispatcher. Wire up all existing CLI commands (init, new, show, link, sync, trace). Implement --help and --version commands. Add error handling for invalid commands. Add tests for CLI routing.

title: Phase 3.5: Analytics and Metrics
description: Implement engram metrics command. Calculate requirement statistics (total, validated, blocked, coverage). Calculate issue statistics (open, resolved, avg resolution time). Calculate test statistics (passing, failing, not_run, pass rate). Calculate velocity (items created/resolved per week). Calculate traceability percentages. Generate metrics report with visualizations.

title: Phase 3.3: Neural Activation Algorithm
description: Design Neural Activation algorithm: Stimulus text match plus vector match, Propagation signal decay across weighted links, Response ranked results with relevance scores. Implement propagation engine. Add signal decay calculation. Implement relevance scoring. Performance test (10K Neuronas < 50ms).

title: Phase 2.5: Implement engram impact Command
description: Create src/cli/impact.zig for impact analysis. Implement upstream dependency tracing (find all requirements a test validates, find all features a requirement belongs to). Implement downstream dependency tracing (find all tests validating a requirement, find all artifacts implementing a requirement). Add state checking (passing tests, blocked artifacts). Generate impact report with affected requirements count, affected tests with pass/fail status, blocked artifacts/issues, risk level calculation. Add JSON output for CI/CD integration. Write comprehensive tests.

title: Phase 3.2: LLM Optimization
description: Implement _llm metadata parsing and usage. Create token counting utility. Implement summary generation (Tier 3 strategy). Design cache structure in .activations/cache/. Implement cache invalidation on content changes. Add LLM-optimized representation for queries.

title: Phase 3.4: Code Artifact Execution
description: Design sandboxing strategy. Implement subprocess spawning with timeout. Validate context.safe_to_exec true. Capture output for logging. Add security restrictions (network, filesystem). Write security tests.

title: Phase 3.1: Semantic Search Infrastructure
description: Research vector embedding libraries with C-interop. Design .activations/vectors.bin index format. Implement embedding generation integration. Create vector similarity search. Implement BM25 for hybrid search. Performance test with 10K Neuronas.

title: Phase 2.10: Implement Orphan Detection
description: Create src/core/orphan_detector.zig to find unconnected Neuronas. Scan all Neuronas. Identify Neuronas with no connections. Implement findOrphans() function. Add optional: identify disconnected subgraphs. Create engram check-orphans command. Write tests.

title: Performance Benchmarking
description: Create tests/performance/ directory. Implement cold start test (target < 50ms). Implement graph traversal test (depth 1 < 5ms, depth 5 < 10ms). Implement directory scan test (10K files < 500ms). Implement query test (filter 10K Neuronas < 20ms). Create performance regression tests. Add benchmark results tracking. Optimize hot paths if targets not met.

title: Phase 1.6: Integration Testing
description: Create tests/integration/ directory. Write end-to-end tests: Initialize Cortex, Create multiple Neuronas, Link Neuronas together, Sync and verify graph, Trace dependencies, Show Neurona with connections. Create sample Cortex fixture in tests/fixtures/sample_cortex/. Add all integration tests to build.zig.

title: Phase 2.4: Implement engram update Command
description: Create src/cli/update.zig. Parse update specifications (e.g., --set 'status=resolved'). Support multiple field updates in one command. Read existing Neurona file, parse YAML frontmatter. Update specified fields in YAML. Preserve existing frontmatter structure. Validate updated values. Write back to disk with updated timestamp. Add dry-run mode. Write unit and integration tests.

title: Phase 2.3: Complete engram query Command
description: Complete src/cli/query.zig implementation. Implement query parser for filters: type filtering (type:requirement), tag filtering (tag:auth), connection filtering (connected_to:req.auth), status filtering (status:open). Implement AND/OR logic for multiple filters. Add result sorting options. Add limit/offset for pagination. Implement JSON output mode. Write comprehensive tests.

title: Phase 2.2: Complete engram status Command
description: Complete src/cli/status.zig implementation. Implement listing open issues by priority. Add filtering by status (open, in_progress, resolved). Add filtering by type (issue, requirement, test_case). Implement sorting options (priority, date). Add statistics summary. Write unit and integration tests.

title: Phase 2.9: Implement Connection Validation
description: Create src/core/connection_validator.zig for connection validation. Define allowed connections by Neurona type: test_case -> validates -> requirement, issue -> blocks -> requirement/artifact, artifact -> implements -> requirement. Implement validateConnection() function. Add cardinality constraints (e.g., binary_node max 1 left/right). Add cycle detection for certain connection types. Integrate validation into engram link and engram update. Write unit tests.

title: Phase 2.8: Implement State Management
description: Create src/core/state_manager.zig for state transition enforcement. Define state transition rules: issues open -> in_progress -> resolved -> closed, tests not_run -> running -> passing -> failing, requirements draft -> approved -> implemented -> verified. Implement validateStateTransition() function. Add forbidden transition detection. Implement state enforcement in engram update. Add state history tracking. Write unit tests for all transitions.
